summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.1°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1467 m), light levels (up 8244 lux), feels like temperature (up 4.0°C), and outside temperature (up 3.4°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 6.9m higher than yesterday, 849.6m lower than the past week, 1467.2m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 765m to 2220m and averaged 1272.6m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. Drizzle or light rain possible, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and periods of sunshine are expected. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
